name: list all
desc: Shows list of all available tags

name: list
desc: Shows list of item/skills that have specified tag
If list is used by itself, it works the same as list all
You can use `+` symbol to add filters to your search
If you don't include passive or active, it will search on both
example: -tag list hero + passive + buff + magic damage

name: info
desc: Shows a description of a given tag
